content.about: Des Moines Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Des Moines area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Linda R.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

reviews.author: John J.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: James S.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Des Moines provides professional antique appraisal services in the Des Moines area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Linda D.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Jennifer W.
reviews.content: Heritage Valuations Des Moines's knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation Heritage Valuations Des Moines provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Jennifer W.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.
